import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import '../styles/AboutPage.css'; const AboutPage = () => { return ( <>
Home / About us

About Railroad Cotton Exchange

Our Story

Railroad Cotton Exchange was established in 2010 with a passion for providing high-quality fabrics and crafting supplies to enthusiasts around the world. What started as a small local shop has grown into a trusted online destination for crafters, sewers, and DIY enthusiasts.

Our founders, with over 30 years of combined experience in textiles, envisioned a place where quality, creativity, and customer satisfaction would be the foundation of every transaction.

Our Mission

At Railroad Cotton Exchange, our mission is to inspire creativity by providing premium quality fabrics, notions, and patterns at affordable prices. We believe that everyone should have access to the materials they need to bring their creative visions to life.

We are committed to sustainable practices and supporting local artisans whenever possible. Our curated selection of products reflects our dedication to quality, craftsmanship, and environmental consciousness.

Our Promise

When you shop with Railroad Cotton Exchange, you can expect:

  • Premium quality materials sourced from trusted suppliers
  • Exceptional customer service and expert advice
  • Fast, reliable shipping to get your supplies to you quickly
  • A commitment to sustainable and ethical business practices
  • A supportive community of fellow craft enthusiasts
); }; export default AboutPage;
